forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 73. East wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. Southeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the day draws to a close in Boston, the sky embraces a gentle embrace of clouds, casting a soft veil across the horizon. The lingering warmth of the afternoon has given way to a serene evening, with temperatures settling comfortably around 58 degrees. This soothing atmosphere suggests a mild southeast breeze, whispering promises of an easy night ahead. Despite the subtle presence of clouds, visibility remains clear, allowing the shimmering lights of the city to dance against the dusky backdrop—a perfect reminder of urban life’s quiet vibrance.

As you contemplate your evening plans, consider dressing in layers; a light jacket will offer just the right touch of coziness without stifling warmth. Perhaps a stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely visit to one of Boston's inviting cafés, where the aroma of fresh coffee mingles with the gentle evening air, would suit your desires. Engaging in such simple pleasures under the evolving sky can transform this ordinary night into something unexpectedly delightful, capturing the essence of a Boston evening as the day softly recedes.
